Package cashregister

Class CashRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • cashregister.CashRegister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICashRegister, IObserver
    public class CashRegister
extends Object
implements ICashRegister, IObserver
    Provides the implementation for a cash register that allows to manage IProducts and Records. All these elements are managed within the cash register and can be dynamically added or removed.

    In addition IShoppingCarts are also managed by this implementation and each cash register can have several IShoppingCarts. IProducts can be selected from the cash register and be placed in one of the managed IShoppingCarts. The cash register class implements the ICashRegister interface.

    To provide the possibility for a meaningful output of the elements managed, User Interfaces can be registered. These User Interfaces are defined via the ICashRegisterUI interface.

    Since the cash register needs to be notified when the list of IProducts changes, it provides an implementation of the IObserver interface. Through this interface other classes are able to notify the cash register about changes and the cash register can act accordingly.

    Author:
    OOP

      • addProductToShoppingCart

        public boolean addProductToShoppingCart​(long id,
                                        IShoppingCartElement element)
        Adds an element IShoppingCartElement to a specific IShoppingCart. The IShoppingCart is identified by an id. If the IShoppingCart can not be found or the IShoppingCartElement can not be added, then the method returns false.

        Only copies of IShoppingCartElements are added to IShoppingCarts.

        Specified by:
        addProductToShoppingCart in interface ICashRegister
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the IShoppingCart
        element - the IShoppingCartElement that should be added to the IShoppingCart
        Returns:
        true if the element could be added to the IShoppingCart, false otherwise

      • payShoppingCart

        public IInvoice payShoppingCart​(long id,
                                IPayment provider)
                         throws ShoppingCartNotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: ICashRegister
        Pays all IShoppingCartElements in a specific IShoppingCart. The IShoppingCart is identified via its id and the payment process is only initiated if the IShoppingCart is managed by the ICashRegister.

        The payment is made via the IPayment provider that is passed to this method. This PaymentProvider provides all methods necessary to complete the payment. Each payment returns a PaymentTransaction.

        The resulting PaymentTransaction is attached to an Invoice. The Invoice contains a list of IShoppingCartElements that have been paid in the PaymentTransaction. Only copies of the paid IShoppingCartElements are stored in the Invoice.

        The Invoice is stored in the implementing class and returned from the method.

        After the payment has been made, the IShoppingCartElements are cleared from the IShoppingCart.

        Specified by:
        payShoppingCart in interface ICashRegister
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the IShoppingCart
        provider - the payment provider
        Returns:
        the IInvoice created or null.
        Throws:
        ShoppingCartNotFoundException - if no IShoppingCart can be found with the given id.

      • findShoppingCartById

        protected IShoppingCart findShoppingCartById​(Long id)
        Searches in the list of IShoppingCarts for a IShoppingCart with the given id. If a IShoppingCart is found the first result is returned, otherwise NULL is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier used to search
        Returns:
        the IShoppingCart if found, otherwise null

      • notifyChange

        public void notifyChange​(ISubjectManagementServer subject)
        This method can be used to notify the observer about changes in the subject that is passed along. If the passed subject is observed by this object (it is in the list of observed subjects and the observation is activated), then the product list is updated with the information available from the subject.
        Specified by:
        notifyChange in interface IObserver
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject that has been changed

      • selectProduct

        public IShoppingCartElement selectProduct​(String product)
        Description copied from interface: ICashRegister
        Selects a IShoppingCartElement (represented by an IProduct) from the CashRegister and returns it. This selection process is used to retrieve products and further process them (for example to put them into the IShoppingCart).
        Specified by:
        selectProduct in interface ICashRegister
        Parameters:
        product - The name of a product that should be selected
        Returns:
        the product if found, null otherwise

      • activateNotifications

        public void activateNotifications​(ISubjectManagementServer subject)
        Description copied from interface: IObserver
        Allows the handling of notifications by the observer for the given subject. Until a subject is activated at the observer, all notifications are received but discarded.
        Specified by:
        activateNotifications in interface IObserver
        Parameters:
        subject - the subject that notifies about updates.
